articles.author: Dan Goodin
articles.title: iOS and Android juice jacking defenses have been trivial to bypass for years - Ars Technica
articles.description: New ChoiceJacking attack allows malicious chargers to steal data from phones.

articles.title: Hubble at 35: Unveiling a Universe of Dazzling Images and Deep Discoveries - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Hubble’s 35-year journey showcases humanity’s boldest space achievements, capturing everything from new stars forming to ancient galaxies. Its discoveries revolutionized our understanding of black holes, dark energy, and distant worlds, while its stunning ima…
articles.content:
In celebration of the NASA/ESA Hubble Space Telescope’s 35 years in Earth orbit, an assortment of compelling images have been released that were recently taken by Hubble. Credit: NASA, ESA, STScI
